content:
Has anyone been able to test/validate the second scenario of the cds-hooks track (Implement Security to the FHIR Server)?
We have a service ready to test with a secure server that supplies the oauth.token:
https://cds-hooks-apps.medapptech.com/oauth-hook/cds-services
I don't believe any of the EHR implementations (mine included) have been able to get it implemented yet. :-(
I am going to continue working on my implementation even after this Connectathon today and will try out your service and let you know.
Ultimately, we need to get demo.cds-hooks.org updated so that we can try it there too
